inclusion.criterion: sensitive disease with decrease in serum or urine paraprotein levels of >50%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: performance status: -CALGB 0.1 or Karnofsky greater than 70%
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: serum creatinine < 2 x upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: bilirubin < 2 x upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: transaminases < 2 x upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: MUGA resting EF > 50% or more than a 5% increase with exercise if <50%
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis, on hemodialysis for ESRD. She was treated with various regimens including VAD, thalidomide, and velcade.
